results.prompt: Provide a technical description of this image. Identify all text, numbers, symbols, and structural elements. Be precise and systematic in your analysis.
results.output_text:

There are several instances of the letter "w" in the equation, along with other letters such as "q" and "k". Additionally, there are multiple instances of the number "2" scattered throughout the equation. Overall, the equation seems to be a complex representation of a quantum mechanics concept.

results.prompt: Create a comprehensive caption for this image. Include all visible text, data points, chart elements, and contextual information. Make it suitable for academic or technical documentation.
results.output_text: The equation shown here is an example of the physics concept known as "hysteresis". This concept describes how materials exhibit non-linear behavior when subjected to cyclic loading conditions. It can be applied in various fields such as electrical engineering, mechanical design, and material science.
